post:
<center><u><b><font size="5">NVMe SSD and HDD cpanel Hosting</font></b></u>

Our NVMe SSD cpanel shared hosting ensures the fastest page load times for your sites.
Located in Germany with unlimited DDoS protection and nginx web server.
Our HDD cpanel reseller hosting offers increased storage capacity for resellers while still offering great performance.
Located in London with unlimited DDoS protection and apache webserver.

<u><b>Softaculous</b></u>
Included with all cpanel plans, softaculous allows our clients to deploy a number of scripts such as Joomla and wordpress with a single click.

<u><b>JetBackUp</b></u>
We offer local and offsite backup with Jetbackup. We also allow our clients to specify their own offsite backup locations that they would like their backups to be taken to.
Local backups are taken daily. Offsite backups are taken 3 times weekly incrementally.

<u><b>CloudFlare RailGun</b></u>
We have been a proud Cloudflare partner for over a year and have always included CF railgun with all of our shared and reseller hosting packages.
Railgun comes free (usually $200/m) with any of our plans allowing you to cache the uncacheable to further boost your site speeds.

<u><b>CloudLinux</b></u>
Both our shared servers utilize cloudlinux ensuring greater security for shared hosting clients.
Our LV limits can be found [here](https://hostdoc.co.uk/limits)

Assisted Migration
AutoSSL
SSH Terminal Access
24/7 Support
Instant Activation
30 Day Money Back Guarantee

Uptime stats
We are proud to offer a 99.7% uptime guarantee.
We are even prouder to currently have 99.9% uptime for both our [shared](https://status.hostdoc.co.uk/780596370) and [reseller servers](https://status.hostdoc.co.uk/780735560).

<u><b><font size="4">Cyberpanel Add On</font></b></u>
As an addition to your chosen cpanel shared or reseller plan, we now also offer an additional shared hosting plan utilizing cyberpanel.
Cyberpanel is an exceptional control panel with openlitespeed web server and a few one click installation apps such as wordpress which comes with LSCache plugin by default.
You are free to choose to have your free CyberPanel shared hosting provisioned in a choice of 5 locations:
France
Finland
Canada
Singapore
Australia
</center>
<u><b><font size="2">How To Order</font></b></u>
<center>Simply add to your order notes the location you would like and domain you wish to use. Alternatively, you can visit [here](https://clientsarea.hostdoc.co.uk/cart.php?gid=20) when you are ready and pick the location of your choice but <b>DO NOT</b> proceed to the gateway. Rather, leave a note in the order notes that you would like to claim your free hosting followed by opening a ticket.</center>
<u><b><font size="2">Features</font></b></u>
<center>Openlitespeed Web Server
One Click CMS Installation
Free SSL
Additional Locations - £1.50/year</center>
<u><b><font size="2">What Is Included?</font></b></u>
<pre><code>2 Domains
1GB Storage
100GB Bandwidth (20GB APAC)
3 Databases
3 Email Accounts</code></pre>

<u><b><font color="red" size="2">CyberPanel Disclaimer</font></b></u>
There is no DNS server. A/MX/CNAME etc records must be used
No backups are taken or implied for cyberpanel services
All locations can be bundled for £5 per year
No refunds are offered for cyberpanel shared hosting as it is primarily a value added service for cpanel shared and reseller hosting clients.
